credit_line: Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives
title: Fabric Design for Torah Mantel and Ark Lining
medium: Brush and gold paint and white gouache over graphite on tan wove paper
description: Pattern created by repeating Hebrew character "Shin" (God) in alternating rows (4,3,4,3,3,3) across surface.  Splotches of white gouache in the spaces between the characters.
name: Drawing
